title: OBSCENE illusionism
description: I invite you to enter the fantasy world of Leione, a teenager who gets into aphorisms unseemly after seeing her cousin Andrew in a bathtub, during his bath. Years later she becomes a lass and returns to see her cousin. And after that, her thoughts obscene the storm again and this time more often, due to her unbridled passion for the boy...An erotic and dramatic novel...
author: Pet Torres
